amendment.description: An amendment No. 27 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to establish a port performance statistics program, with quarterly reports to Congress. The program will collect basic uniform data on port performance and provide empirical visibility into how U.S. ports are operating, identify key congestion issues, and ensure U.S. commerce continues to flow efficiently.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Newhouse amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A068) offered by Mr. Newhouse to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A068) offered by Mr. Newhouse to the Rules amendment (A001).
